ProjectTitle: From Y-chromosome to microbiome: an interdisciplinary kinship study
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/04/2023
Please note that Lirias is not suitable for data sharing, but you can use the KU Leuven data repository RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository, EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) for example has many for life sciences data, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
